She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Ms Kirsten Gillibrand said on NBC's Meet The Press programme. Job number one is showing this new phone to people, he said. ''What we find is that once people see the phone, they fall in love with it.''
